channel.title: Need some help with some basic 317 DELTA | rep++
channel.description:
Haven't been coding for more than a year, maybe two o.O Feels good to be back though!
Kinda forgot all about coding, but I'll get on track in no time.
I've been struggling with something; highscores.
How do I add; lets say a herblore's highscore in an interface of anykind? To rank the top players from hightest to lowest. 1-100.

item.title: Need some help with some basic 317 DELTA | rep++
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

um, this is from PI base, but you can convert it, and you can change it so it reaches to herblore level?

public void highscores() { getPA().sendFrame126("Rune Of Gods Highscores", 6399); for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { if(ranks[i] > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i); } }
just guessing lol hope this helped?

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with some basic 317 DELTA | rep++
